message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I understand that the product is valuable to you, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $13,000. How about we meet at $11,000?
